channel.title: Comments on: Project 3
channel.description: Group Project Site for SEng466 at the University of Victoria

item.title: By: peter
item.dc:creator: peter
item.description: How to control quadcopter when all bldc motor calibrated at different pwm values ,I am having difficulty in flying ,as 1bldc start very late
item.content:encoded: How to control quadcopter when all bldc motor calibrated at different pwm values ,I am having difficulty in flying ,as 1bldc start very late

item.title: By: emmanuel
item.dc:creator: emmanuel
item.description: hi good work, i have being reading your site for some time now, and want to say well job for this wonderful work. currently am doing my bsc project on quadcoter but i want to use xbee for communication, i see you used NRF24L01, please any help on how i can use xbee. Also an controlling the quad via a GUI built using pyqt and game pad as joystick for control. thank
item.content:encoded:
hi
good work, i have being reading your site for some time now, and want to say well job for this wonderful work. currently am doing my bsc project on quadcoter but i want to use xbee for communication, i see you used NRF24L01, please any help on how i can use xbee. Also an controlling the quad via a GUI built using pyqt and game pad as joystick for control. thank

item.title: By: hani
item.dc:creator: hani
item.description:
Hello everyone! how connect optical flow sensor to APM2.6 board ? Do the same to connect this sensor to apm2.5?
I would be happy if the answer!
item.content:encoded:
Hello everyone!
how connect optical flow sensor to APM2.6 board ? Do the same to connect this sensor to apm2.5?

I would be happy if the answer!

item.title: By: Rafi
item.dc:creator: Rafi
item.description: Hi I really like all of your contributions to quads and arduino and I myself am starting a similar project, although on a smaller scale. Would it be possible to compile all of your work(i.e all of these pages (Project 1 -3)) in an easy to print pdf ? Thanks!
item.content:encoded:
Hi I really like all of your contributions to quads and arduino and I myself am starting a similar project, although on a smaller scale. Would it be possible to compile all of your work(i.e all of these pages (Project 1 -3)) in an easy to print pdf ?
Thanks!

item.title: By: help with interdog aggression
item.dc:creator: help with interdog aggression
item.description: Very good information. Lucky me I discovered your website by chance (stumbleupon). I have bookmarked it for later!
item.content:encoded:
Very good information. Lucky me I discovered your website by chance (stumbleupon).
I have bookmarked it for later!

item.title: By: Garrett
item.dc:creator: Garrett
item.description: Hey, you can see the code all on GitHub at https://github.com/2012SEng466/copter
item.content:encoded: Hey, you can see the code all on GitHub at https://github.com/2012SEng466/copter

item.title: By: Fábio
item.dc:creator: Fábio
item.description:
Hi,
Could you send me the code? I'm trying to do a quadcopter too, but I didn't get good results to communicate MPU 6050 and NRF24L01, I would like to use your code to help me, ok?
Thanks my friend!
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

Could you send me the code? I’m trying to do a quadcopter too, but I didn’t get good results to communicate MPU 6050 and NRF24L01, I would like to use your code to help me, ok?

Thanks my friend!

item.title: By: Zandra
item.dc:creator: Zandra
item.description:
It was hard to find your website in google.
I found it on 13 place, you should build some quality backlinks , it will help you to get more visitors. I know how to help you, just type in google - k2 seo tips and tricks

item.title: By: Rashid
item.dc:creator: Rashid
item.description: Hi we are working on a project on quadcopter. We want to use aeroquad software but we dont want to use any shield. We are using arduino mega, 6Dof GY521, nrf905. Without shield how can we connect components to arduino??
item.content:encoded: Hi we are working on a project on quadcopter. We want to use aeroquad software but we dont want to use any shield. We are using arduino mega, 6Dof GY521, nrf905. Without shield how can we connect components to arduino??
